Join the Publix IT Team as a Principal SQA Analyst where you will be responsible for planning testing efforts and executing on small to large enterprise level and customer facing applications by translating functional requirements, project documentation, release notes into test requirement and scenarios.Additional responsibilities will include developing and executing automated/manual test cases for regression, develop and execute load/performance testing and coordinate with development teams for test planning and execution.
